docs.title: Architecture
docs.text:
graph LR
  subgraph Backend

    Neon
    Rt
    Dsp
    Gfx

  end

  subgraph Client

    Agent

  end

  Agent <-- gRPC --> Neon
  Neon <--> Rt
  Rt <--> Gfx
  Neon <--> Dsp
  Neon <--> Gfx
  Rt <--> Dsp

docs.title: Sampler(pack)
docs.text:
Neon's Sampling Machine.

Creates a new sampler.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default pack str

The sample pack to use.

required

docs.title: play(name)
docs.text:
Play a sample.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default name str

The name of the sample.

required

docs.title: stop(name)
docs.text:
Stop playing a sample.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default name str

The name of the sample.

required
